<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the demanded bits for a narrowing MVE intrinsic. The TopOpc is the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// opcode specifying a Top/Bottom instruction, which can change between</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The only odd/even lanes of operand 0 will only be demanded depending</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on whether this is a top/bottom instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a9407ebeb07769b15977760b26beb7db6"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a9407ebeb07769b15977760b26beb7db6">ARMTTIImpl::getIntImmCostInst</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Imm, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Division by a constant can be turned into multiplication, but only if we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// know it&#39;s constant. So it&#39;s not so much that the immediate is cheap (it&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not), but that the alternative is worse.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: this is probably unneeded with GlobalISel.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((Opcode == Instruction::SDiv || Opcode == Instruction::UDiv ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">       Opcode == Instruction::SRem || Opcode == Instruction::URem) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">      Idx == 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Leave any gep offsets for the CodeGenPrepare, which will do a better job at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// splitting any large offsets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::GetElementPtr &amp;&amp; Idx != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::And) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// UXTB/UXTH</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Imm == 255 || Imm == 65535)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Conversion to BIC is free, and means we can use ~Imm instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::min(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a41c8a4fccc70b2cde9a38d48c5a6ba9d">getIntImmCost</a>(Imm, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a41c8a4fccc70b2cde9a38d48c5a6ba9d">getIntImmCost</a>(~Imm, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::Add)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Conversion to SUB is free, and means we can use -Imm instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::min(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a41c8a4fccc70b2cde9a38d48c5a6ba9d">getIntImmCost</a>(Imm, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a41c8a4fccc70b2cde9a38d48c5a6ba9d">getIntImmCost</a>(-Imm, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::ICmp &amp;&amp; Imm.isNegative() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">      Ty-&gt;getIntegerBitWidth() == 32) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t NegImm = -Imm.getSExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;isThumb2() &amp;&amp; NegImm &lt; 1&lt;&lt;12)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// icmp X, #-C -&gt; cmn X, #C</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;isThumb() &amp;&amp; NegImm &lt; 1&lt;&lt;8)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// icmp X, #-C -&gt; adds X, #C</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// xor a, -1 can always be folded to MVN</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::Xor &amp;&amp; Imm.isAllOnes())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ensures negative constant of min(max()) or max(min()) patterns that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// match to SSAT instructions don&#39;t get hoisted</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Inst &amp;&amp; ((ST-&gt;hasV6Ops() &amp;&amp; !ST-&gt;isThumb()) || ST-&gt;isThumb2()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">      Ty-&gt;getIntegerBitWidth() &lt;= 32) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AdjustCost = &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsLegalFPType = &#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> EltVT = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#aa85c75e8eb097f02caeb5b9119eebfef">getScalarType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EltVT == MVT::f32 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasVFP2Base()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extending masked load/Truncating masked stores is expensive because we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// currently don&#39;t split them. This means that we&#39;ll likely end up</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loading/storing each element individually (hence the high cost).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// As general rule, fp converts that were not matched above are scalarized</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and cost 1 vcvt for each lane, so long as the instruction is available.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If not it will become a series of function calls.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CallCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aa9afd54ce2ef21c71a89f9c5d7df6a40">getCallInstrCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, Dst, &#123;Src&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lanes = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcTy.isFixedLengthVector())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal">      Lanes = SrcTy.getVectorNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsLegalFPType(SrcTy) &amp;&amp; IsLegalFPType(DstTy))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lanes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lanes &#42; CallCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ae690127648393001a7d5b93dc23da7b3">ISD::TRUNCATE</a> &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="normal">      SrcTy.isFixedLengthVector()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Treat a truncate with larger than legal source (128bits for MVE) as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expensive, 2 instructions per lane.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((SrcTy.getScalarType() == MVT::i8 ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="normal">         SrcTy.getScalarType() == MVT::i16 ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal">         SrcTy.getScalarType() == MVT::i32) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal">        SrcTy.getSizeInBits() &gt; 128 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal">        SrcTy.getSizeInBits() &gt; DstTy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcTy.getVectorNumElements() &#42; 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scalar integer conversion costs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22d459b5e41e15cf4749a550999fb17e">TypeConversionCostTblEntry</a> ARMIntegerConversionTbl&#91;&#93; = &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// i16 -&gt; i64 requires two dependent operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#123; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a5183f3d72924bc7c77ba8d3f5de9f602">ISD::SIGN&#95;EXTEND</a>, MVT::i64, MVT::i16, 2 &#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Truncates on i64 are assumed to be free.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#123; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ae690127648393001a7d5b93dc23da7b3">ISD::TRUNCATE</a>,    MVT::i32, MVT::i64, 0 &#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#123; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ae690127648393001a7d5b93dc23da7b3">ISD::TRUNCATE</a>,    MVT::i16, MVT::i64, 0 &#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#123; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ae690127648393001a7d5b93dc23da7b3">ISD::TRUNCATE</a>,    MVT::i8,  MVT::i64, 0 &#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#123; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ae690127648393001a7d5b93dc23da7b3">ISD::TRUNCATE</a>,    MVT::i1,  MVT::i64, 0 &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcTy.isInteger()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Entry = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afa7713ec60e272a2e478a03eecc40bcd">ConvertCostTableLookup</a>(ARMIntegerConversionTbl, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                   DstTy.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a6a81c1cc06a00a0096d839032b5984e9">getSimpleVT</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                   SrcTy.getSimpleVT()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AdjustCost(Entry-&gt;Cost);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BaseCost = ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp; Src-&gt;isVectorTy()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="normal">                     ? ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="normal">                     : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AdjustCost(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal">      BaseCost &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad0c9ac06022884eb218dc8f8c4056e43">BaseT::getCastInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Dst, Src, CCH, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#afd09053fe36fc5a2526341e8fcd2af83"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#afd09053fe36fc5a2526341e8fcd2af83">ARMTTIImpl::getVectorInstrCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ValTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Penalize inserting into an D-subregister. We end up with a three times</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasSlowLoadDSubregister() &amp;&amp; Opcode == Instruction::InsertElement &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 3;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasNEON() &amp;&amp; (Opcode == Instruction::InsertElement ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">                        Opcode == Instruction::ExtractElement)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cross-class copies are expensive on many microarchitectures,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so assume they are expensive by default.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(ValTy)-&gt;getElementType()-&gt;isIntegerTy())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 3;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Even if it&#39;s not a cross class copy, this likely leads to mixing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of NEON and VFP code and should be therefore penalized.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ValTy-&gt;isVectorTy() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="normal">        ValTy-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits() &lt;= 32)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::max&lt;InstructionCost&gt;(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a27bfcb3dd99fa7a7ca8dc24eeac6e8e6">BaseT::getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, ValTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, Op0, Op1),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">          2U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp; (Opcode == Instruction::InsertElement ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 Opcode == Instruction::ExtractElement)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Integer cross-lane moves are more expensive than float, which can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sometimes just be vmovs. Integer involve being passes to GPR registers,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// causing more of a delay.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(ValTy-&gt;getScalarType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LT.first &#42; (ValTy-&gt;getScalarType()-&gt;isIntegerTy() ? 4 : 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a27bfcb3dd99fa7a7ca8dc24eeac6e8e6">BaseT::getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, ValTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, Op0, Op1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#ae83866ca1a903e74fd6b66c1fec0d528"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#ae83866ca1a903e74fd6b66c1fec0d528">ARMTTIImpl::getCmpSelInstrCost</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Thumb scalar code size cost for select.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bba737cfc93e5a2ff961677d57186167e7c">TTI::TCK&#95;CodeSize</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a78d0f198115bfe3331ab7cfcf7a40a97">ISD::SELECT</a> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><Highlight kind="normal">      ST-&gt;isThumb() &amp;&amp; !ValTy-&gt;isVectorTy()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assume expensive structs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, ValTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) == MVT::Other)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Select costs can vary because they:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - may require one or more conditional mov (including an IT),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - can&#39;t operate directly on immediates,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - require live flags, which we can&#39;t copy around easily.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(ValTy).first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Possible IT instruction for Thumb2, or more for Thumb1.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There are two types - the input that specifies the type of the compare</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// split, we may need an expensive shuffle to get two in sync. This has the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expensive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.second.isVector() &amp;&amp; LT.second.getVectorNumElements() &gt; 2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is somewhat of a hack. The problem that we are facing is that SROA</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// creates a sequence of shift, and, or instructions to construct values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These sequences are recognized by the ISel and have zero-cost. Not so for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the vectorized code. Because we have support for v2i64 but not i64 those</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sequences look particularly beneficial to vectorize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To work around this we increase the cost of v2i64 operations to make them</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// seem less beneficial.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.second == MVT::v2i64 &amp;&amp; Op2Info.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/operandvalueinfo/#ab57fcce122c37b4aaff911cf66b62583">isUniform</a>() &amp;&amp; Op2Info.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/operandvalueinfo/#a1a058bd4bb89596c5f97215d985080a5">isConstant</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(DataTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For now, it is assumed that for the MVE gather instructions the loads are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// all effectively serialised. This means the cost is the scalar cost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// multiplied by the number of elements being loaded. This is possibly very</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// conservative, but even so we still end up vectorising loops because the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cost per iteration for many loops is lower than for scalar loops.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> VectorCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumElems &#42; LT.first &#42; ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The scalarization cost should be a lot higher. We use the number of vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// elements plus the scalarization overhead. If masking is required then a lot</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of little blocks will be needed and potentially a scalarized p0 mask,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// greatly increasing the cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ScalarCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(VTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Insert&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;Extract&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOpcode() == Instruction::Store ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><Highlight kind="normal">         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3c0adc1054838f4498e0e860b637a22b">m&#95;Intrinsic&lt;Intrinsic::masked&#95;scatter&gt;</a>())) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><Highlight kind="normal">        (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;TruncInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOperand(0)))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only allow valid type combinations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;getType()-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (((EltSize == 16 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> == 32) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><Highlight kind="normal">           (EltSize == 8 &amp;&amp; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> == 32 || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> == 16))) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> &#42; NumElems == 128)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><Highlight kind="normal">        ExtSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExtSize &#42; NumElems != 128 || NumElems &lt; 4)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Any (aligned) i32 gather will not need to be scalarised.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExtSize == 32)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VectorCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For smaller types, we need to ensure that the gep&#39;s inputs are correctly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// extended from a small enough value. Other sizes (including i64) are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scalarized for now.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExtSize != 8 &amp;&amp; ExtSize != 16)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BitCastInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a> = BC-&gt;getOperand(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GetElementPtrInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a>-&gt;getNumOperands() != 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Scale = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a>-&gt;getResultElementType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scale needs to be correct (which is only relevant for i16s).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Scale != 1 &amp;&amp; Scale &#42; 8 != ExtSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1688"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1689"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// And we need to zext (not sext) the indexes from a small enough type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1690"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ZExt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ZExtInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a>-&gt;getOperand(1))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1691"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ZExt-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;getType()-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits() &lt;= ExtSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1692"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VectorCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1693"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1694"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScalarCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a5dcb8d597c1066eec7ef713b758f78f4"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a5dcb8d597c1066eec7ef713b758f78f4">ARMTTIImpl::getArithmeticReductionCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;ValTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       std::optional&lt;FastMathFlags&gt; FMF,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1703"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1704"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> ValVT = TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, ValTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> = TLI-&gt;InstructionOpcodeToISD(Opcode);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EltSize = ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In general floating point reductions are a series of elementwise</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operations, with free extracts on each step. These are either in-order or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// treewise depending on whether that is allowed by the fast math flags.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a32ec12017722f5b42a295fe5eb0b0bdf">ISD::FADD</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9ab5860c97a00c4627a08cab7b0c8178">ISD::FMUL</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><Highlight kind="normal">      ((EltSize == 32 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasVFP2Base()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><Highlight kind="normal">       (EltSize == 64 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasFP64()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><Highlight kind="normal">       (EltSize == 16 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasFullFP16()))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(ValTy)-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VecLimit = ST-&gt;hasMVEFloatOps() ? 128 : (ST-&gt;hasNEON() ? 64 : -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> VecCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a7aecc3cf03beff532c2b8bfe81e500c8">TTI::requiresOrderedReduction</a>(FMF) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(NumElts) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><Highlight kind="normal">           NumElts &#42; EltSize &gt; VecLimit) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ValTy-&gt;getElementType(), NumElts / 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><Highlight kind="normal">      VecCost += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a949d5831f77e0c9dc7d3509911cf92f2">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumElts /= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For fp16 we need to extract the upper lane elements. MVE can add a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VREV+FMIN/MAX to perform another vector step instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ExtractCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a7aecc3cf03beff532c2b8bfe81e500c8">TTI::requiresOrderedReduction</a>(FMF) &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasMVEFloatOps() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><Highlight kind="normal">        ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f16 &amp;&amp; NumElts == 8) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><Highlight kind="normal">      VecCost += ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) &#42; 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumElts /= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f16)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><Highlight kind="normal">      ExtractCost = NumElts / 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VecCost + ExtractCost +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><Highlight kind="normal">           NumElts &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><Highlight kind="normal">               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a949d5831f77e0c9dc7d3509911cf92f2">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, ValTy-&gt;getElementType(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ac513a7da1bf74fb3e3c594da8534f2d2">ISD::AND</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a7415ab9f2172c59a2ee7c7a02afa56a4">ISD::OR</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a92febb83e6ba116eb7aae8e7e3f70cc1">ISD::XOR</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><Highlight kind="normal">      (EltSize == 64 || EltSize == 32 || EltSize == 16 || EltSize == 8)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElts = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(ValTy)-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VecLimit =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><Highlight kind="normal">        ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() ? 128 : (ST-&gt;hasNEON() ? 64 : -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> VecCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(NumElts) &amp;&amp; NumElts &#42; EltSize &gt; VecLimit) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ValTy-&gt;getElementType(), NumElts / 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><Highlight kind="normal">      VecCost += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a949d5831f77e0c9dc7d3509911cf92f2">getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, VecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumElts /= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For i16/i8, MVE will perform a VREV + VORR/VAND/VEOR for the 64bit vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// step.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasMVEIntegerOps() &amp;&amp; ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() &lt;= 16 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><Highlight kind="normal">        NumElts &#42; EltSize == 64) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ValTy-&gt;getElementType(), NumElts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><Highlight kind="normal">      VecCost += ST-&gt;getMVEVectorCostFactor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a7b2fcbe31b1e7a23ebe5be0c1e70343a"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armttiimpl/#a7b2fcbe31b1e7a23ebe5be0c1e70343a">ARMTTIImpl::getMinMaxReductionCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a80add6b3b1cdaec560907995127adc16">Intrinsic::ID</a> IID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;Ty,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In general floating point reductions are a series of elementwise</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operations, with free extracts on each step. These are either in-order or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// treewise depending on whether that is allowed by the fast math flags.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((IID == Intrinsic::minnum || IID == Intrinsic::maxnum) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><Highlight kind="normal">      ((ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f32 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasVFP2Base()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><Highlight kind="normal">       (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>() == MVT::f64 &amp;&amp; ST-&gt;hasFP64()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VecLimit = ST-&gt;hasMVEFloatOps() ? 128 : (ST-&gt;hasNEON() ? 64 : -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumElts /= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumElts /= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To set up a tail-predicated loop, we need to know the total number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2338"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// elements processed by that loop. Thus, we need to determine the element</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2339"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// size and:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2340"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) it should be uniform for all operations in the vector loop, so we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2341"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    e.g. don&#39;t want any widening/narrowing operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2342"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) it should be smaller than i64s because we don&#39;t have vector operations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2343"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    that work on i64s.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3) we don&#39;t want elements to be reversed or shuffled, to make sure the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2345"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    tail-predication masks/predicates the right lanes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2346"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2347" lineLink="#a786a99e437c617417c56b4b4678138b9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a786a99e437c617417c56b4b4678138b9">canTailPredicateLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2352"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are live-out values, it is probably a reduction. We can predicate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// most reduction operations freely under MVE using a combination of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
