<Link id="l02585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2585"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2586"><Highlight kind="normal">      ExitingValues = ExitingValues &lt; LiveOuts ? LiveOuts : ExitingValues;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2587"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2588"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExitingValues)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2589"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp/#a0623a79f9be44774a206d71ccced388e">UnrollCount</a> /= ExitingValues;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2590"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp/#a0623a79f9be44774a206d71ccced388e">UnrollCount</a> &lt;= 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2591"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2592"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2593"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2594"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For processors with low overhead branching (LOB), runtime unrolling the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2595"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// innermost loop is often detrimental to performance. In these cases the loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2596"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// remainder gets unrolled into a series of compare-and-jump blocks, which in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2597"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// deeply nested loops get executed multiple times, negating the benefits of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2598"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LOB. This is particularly noticable when the loop trip count of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2599"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// innermost loop varies within the outer loop, such as in the case of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2600"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// triangular matrix decompositions. In these cases we will prefer to not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2601"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unroll the innermost loop, with the intention for it to be executed as a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2602"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// low overhead loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2603"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a273ffd11c1ebf40fc70e3b22009adabdabc366f2d0ba3d681e7a3899917c5d3de">Runtime</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2604"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasLOB()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2605"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a91ac801aa45c78e0d0edbc36115ef054">hasLoopInvariantBackedgeTakenCount</a>(L)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2606"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BETC = SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a22d9bcbd44563106d7217f3bd9a4039e">getBackedgeTakenCount</a>(L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2607"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Outer = L-&gt;getOutermostLoop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2608"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((L != Outer &amp;&amp; Outer != L-&gt;getParentLoop()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2609"><Highlight kind="normal">          (L != Outer &amp;&amp; BETC &amp;&amp; !SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a5a19768af81df7e5fe571bc08dcd48b3">isLoopInvariant</a>(BETC, Outer))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2610"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a273ffd11c1ebf40fc70e3b22009adabdabc366f2d0ba3d681e7a3899917c5d3de">Runtime</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2611"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2612"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Check if Ext1 and Ext2 are extends of the same type, doubling the bitwidth</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of the vector elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> areExtDoubled = &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Ext) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
